entry.title: Apple script and Skype
entry.content:
Spent an hour to figure out how applescript works and wrote some epicly awesome tool what helps to kill anybody phone just doing crash pool calls repeatedly every N sec.

```applescript set numberOfAttempts to 100 # how many times? set callToAnumber to "echo123" # put his number here set attemptInterval to 90 # call each 90 sec set callAttemptsCounter to 1

repeat numberOfAttempts times

tell application "Skype"

  send command "CALL " & callToAnumber script name "Call"

end tell delay attemptInterval set callAttemptsCounter to callAttemptsCounter + 1

end repeat ```

in terminal then osascript scriptname and BOOM! 100 calls every 90 secs. Nothing interesting, but applescript has hidden value. Stay tuned!
